name: Gravitational Anomaly
description: A sudden change in the gravitational constant spilled the milky way in the whole galaxy. Panic and chaos everywhere! And God said: Moo! Stop crying over spilled milk. Sigh. Hey Isaac, pass me the cereals please!  // All proceeds will be used to plant trees through Eden Reforestation Projects. Let‘s plant a forest together! 🌲🌲🌲
